level.text: A violation of this chapter shall be subject to:
The fine or penalty set forth in ยง 825 of this title or in this chapter; provided, for a violation for which a fine or penalty is not listed, the fine shall be one hundred dollars ($100);

Impoundment of the vehicle pursuant to the provisions of the Taxicab and Passenger Vehicle for Hire Impoundment Act of 1992, effective March 16, 1993 (D.C. Law 9-199; D.C. Official Code ยง 50 -331)(2009 Repl. & 2011 Supp.));
License suspension, revocation, or non-renewal; or
Any combination of the sanctions listed in this subsection.
